Package com.ae2dms.Controllers

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Controllers.MenuController
public class MenuController
extends java.lang.Object

The Class MenuController is the controller class of menu.fxml. Initialize the menu scene, define some mouse event.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
